pages.text: $(li)Foul Berries are a fruit that can be growed up from $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/autumnity/foul_berry_pips)Foul Berry Pips$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can use this item to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/autumnity/foul_berry_pips)Foul Berry Pips$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/autumnity/foul_berry_sack)Foul Berry Sack$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
$(li)If you eat this fruit, you will get the Foul Taste effect during 15 seconds.
